title: [1.12.2-1.7][Sound Reloader——声音重载]
author: 中间栖姬
txt_content:
本帖最后由 没糖的葫芦 于 2018-10-9 14:48 编辑 

++简介++
English：Simply reloads minecraft's sound system. I made this before I realized F3+T could be used to reload all resources (Resource Pack, for example) but as that is extremely slow (Like changing a resource pack slow) I decided to publish this anyway. By default it binds to the 'P' key, but it remaps like any other key.

On Windows it resets to the systems default sound device, without restarting MC/reloading resources. Not quite sure if it works the same on Mac/Linux. Be happy to test it out if requested, or add a check to make sure it doesn't crash there (Although it shouldn't as far as I know).
中文：重载minecraft的声音系统，F3+T可以快速重载资源包，但是这样做很慢。所以按"P"来重载会快一些，你也可以改成其他键。
这个mod会重置声音驱动的设定（不用担心，只是在游戏中），Mac和Linux系统尚未测试。

1.10.2这个问题比较明显，尤其是你用自定义材质包，添加shincolle这类mod或者使用红石和压力板的时候，很容易突然就没了声音。
垃圾1.10.2，要不是mod作者弃坑，1.7.10的mod又不更新了，何苦加一堆优化mod解决这种问题
